index.title: RollerCraft
index.content:
RollerCraft is a game based off Rolling Sky developed by Minimax PTE. LTD. Players drag a ball horizontally across the screen to dodge obstacles and collect items while progressing forward at a constant rate toward the finish line.
The game contains both official levels and user-created levels. This website will focus on both guiding beginner editors through getting started and experienced editors on newly released features.
For Beginner Editors
If you haven’t ever created a Rolling Sky or RollerCraft level before, don’t worry! This section will guide you step-by-step on how to get started creating.


Creating your First Level


Learning the Editor Layout


Common Questions


For Experienced Editors
If you are familiar with RollerCraft’s UGC editor, (…)

ugc/index.title: UGC
ugc/index.content:
UGC stands for User Generated Content. RollerCraft allows users to create their own levels and upload them to the RollerCraft servers. For more information on how to create your own levels, check out the guides.
This page contains links to important UGC information.
